message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. It's a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $1,150,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to go that low. Considering the true value of the product, I'm prepared to accept $1,250,000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's worth while giving you a good deal. I'm confident this price is agreeable and will allow us to close the deal.
